Spell.Name: Burning Hands
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip causes minor fire damage to a single target the caster can touch.

Spell.Name: Corrosive Sting
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip hurls a small blob of acid at a single enemy for minor damage.

Spell.Name: Jolt
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip hurls a small arc of electricity at a single enemy for minor damage.

Spell.Name: Snowball
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip hurls a small snowball at a single enemy for minor ice and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Thrown Stone
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip telekinetically hurls a small stone at a single enemy for minor damage.

Spell.Name: Lullaby
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip attempts to put a single target to sleep for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Shrinking Ray
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip causes a single target to grow smaller for five minutes.

Spell.Name: True Strike
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip gives the target a +1 bonus to hit in combat for one minute.

Spell.Name: Minor Shield
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip gives the target a +2 bonus to armor class for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Reflection
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip gives the caster a single mirror image for five minutes of protection.

Spell.Name: Glowing Light
Spell.Description: This arcane cantrip creates a small, softly glowing light that circles the caster for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Flame Arrow
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes minor fire damage to a single target.

Spell.Name: Icicle
Spell.Description: This arcane spell hurls a spiked shard of ice at a single enemy for ice and piercing damage.

Spell.Name: Sizzle
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes a single enemy to sustain a mild shock from electrical damage.

Spell.Name: Acid Arrow
Spell.Description: This arcane spell hurls a bolt of acid at a single enemy causing acid damage.

Spell.Name: Magic Missile
Spell.Description: This arcane spell creates a number of small energy spheres that strike a single target.

Spell.Name: Flying Fist
Spell.Description: This arcane spell conjures a fist of force energy that slams into a single target.

Spell.Name: Whirling Blade
Spell.Description: This arcane spell conjures a sword that flies at and strikes a single target.

Spell.Name: Sleep
Spell.Description: This arcane spell attempts to put a small number of enemies to sleep for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Burden
Spell.Description: This arcane spell lowers the amount an enemy can carry for one hour, potentially slowing them down and tiring them quicker.

Spell.Name: Lighten Load
Spell.Description: This arcane spell increases the amount an ally can carry for one hour.

Spell.Name: Resist Energy
Spell.Description: This arcane spell improves the casters resistence to fire, earth, ice and air damage for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Arcane Shield
Spell.Description: This arcane spell gives the caster a +5 bonus to armor class for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Protection from Arrows
Spell.Description: This arcane spell protects the caster against piercing arrows for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Featherfall
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes the party to take less damage from falling.

Spell.Name: Flaming Burst
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes fire damage to a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Snowball Storm
Spell.Description: This arcane spell hurls a small snowball at a small group of enemies for minor ice and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Lightning Arc
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes a single enemy to sustain a heavy shock.

Spell.Name: Corrode
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes a single enemy acid damage and weakens their armor class for one hour.

Spell.Name: Hold Person
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes the target to be held for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Stinking Cloud
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes the target to be nauseated for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Armor Melt
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes the target group of enemies to suffer a penalty to armor class for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Dispel Magic
Spell.Description: This arcane spell attempts to remove one magical effect from the target.

Spell.Name: Fiery Aura
Spell.Description: This arcane spell provides imbues a single ally so their physical attacks also cause fire damage for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Cold Aura
Spell.Description: This arcane spell provides imbues a single ally so their physical attacks also cause ice damage for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Shocking Aura
Spell.Description: This arcane spell provides imbues a single ally so their physical attacks also cause lightning damage for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Missile Shield
Spell.Description: This arcane spell provides partial proteciton to the party against piercing arrows for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Mage Armor
Spell.Description: This arcane spell gives the caster a +2 bonus to armor class for one hour.

Spell.Name: Mirror Image
Spell.Description: This arcane spell gives the caster a 2-3 mirror images for ten minutes of protection.

Spell.Name: Wizard Eye
Spell.Description: This arcane spell allows the caster to get an eagle eye view of the surrounding terrain for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Water Breathing
Spell.Description: This arcane spell allows the party to breath underwater for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Fireball
Spell.Description: This arcane spell hurls a ball of fire at a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Iceball
Spell.Description: This arcane spell hurls a ball of ice at a small group of enemies for ice and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Lightning Bolt
Spell.Description: This arcane spell hurls a bolt of lightning at a small group of enemies for electrical damage.

Spell.Name: Acid Ball
Spell.Description: This arcane spell hurls a ball of acid at a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Magic Missile Storm
Spell.Description: This arcane spell hurls a number of magical missiles a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Sound Burst
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes a small amount of blunt damage to a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Derangement
Spell.Description: This arcane spell attempts to drive a single enemy insane for two hours.

Spell.Name: Magic Screen
Spell.Description: This arcane spell increases the resistance of all party members to magical energy by 30% for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Stoneskin
Spell.Description: This arcane spell gives the caster 50 points of damage shielding for one hour.

Spell.Name: Greater Resist Energy
Spell.Description: This arcane spell improves the casters resistence to fire, earth, ice and air damage by a fair amount for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Dancing Lights
Spell.Description: This arcane spell creates a small, softly glowing light that circles the caster for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Word of recallstart
Spell.Description: This arcane spell teleports the party to the adventures starting location.

Spell.Name: Levitate
Spell.Description: This arcane spell allows the party to levitate up or down.

Spell.Name: Wall of Fire
Spell.Description: This arcane spell creates a wall of fire that damages a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Ice Storm
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes a storm over a group of enemies inflicting ice and piercing damage.

Spell.Name: Shock
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes heavy electrical damage to a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Incendiary Cloud
Spell.Description: This arcane spell creates a cloud of fire that damages a small group of enemies for thirty seconds.

Spell.Name: Acidic Fog
Spell.Description: This arcane spell creates a cloud acid damaging a small group of enemies for thirty seconds.

Spell.Name: Arcane Fire
Spell.Description: This arcane spell hurls an energy bolt that appears like blue fire at a single enemy for moderate magical damage.

Spell.Name: Clumsiness
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes a group of enemies to suffer a penalty to their dexterity and damage bonus.

Spell.Name: Dancing Sword
Spell.Description: This arcane spell summons a greatsword made of enchanted adamantium to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Armor Plate
Spell.Description: This arcane spell raises the armor class of the party by 2 for the next hour.

Spell.Name: Spellshield
Spell.Description: This arcane spell blocks the next ten to twelve levels of spells targetting the caster for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Force Shield
Spell.Description: This arcane spell blocks half of all blunt damage and one quarter of all piercing and slashing damage.

Spell.Name: Greater Dispel Magic
Spell.Description: This arcane spell removes one random harmful magical effect from each ally.

Spell.Name: Firestorm
Spell.Description: This arcane spell creates a large storm of fire that damages all enemies for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Cone of Cold
Spell.Description: This arcane spell creates a cone of intense cold inflicting ice damage to a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Chain Lightning
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes lightning to shoot from enemy to enemy.

Spell.Name: Prismic Missile
Spell.Description: This arcane spell hurls a shimmering bolt of energy at a single target causing fire, ice and electrical damage and potentially blinding the enemy.

Spell.Name: Fire Shield
Spell.Description: This arcane spell gives the caster a shield of fire, protecting them from fire and damaging enemies that strike them in hand to hand combat.

Spell.Name: Acidic Shield
Spell.Description: This arcane spell gives the caster a coating of acid, protecting them from acid and damaging enemies that strike them in hand to hand combat.

Spell.Name: Reflect Spells
Spell.Description: This arcane spell protects the caster by reflecting the next five to seven levels of spells back at their casters for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Teleport
Spell.Description: This arcane spell allows the party to teleport to a location they've already travelled to.

Spell.Name: Fly
Spell.Description: This arcane spell allows the party to fly for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Golden Touch
Spell.Description: This arcane spell transforms one item into 40% of its base value in gold.

Spell.Name: Meteor Storm
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes meteors to fall on a group of enemies inflicting fire and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Glacier
Spell.Description: This arcane spell creates a large glacier of ice that crashes down on all enemies for a large amount of damage.

Spell.Name: Electricute
Spell.Description: This arcane spell causes massive electrical damage to a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Acid Storm
Spell.Description: This arcane causes acid to rain down on a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Shatter
Spell.Description: This arcane causes the target construct to make a fortitude save or be destroyed.

Spell.Name: Unbinding
Spell.Description: This arcane spell attempts to remove all magical effects from the target group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Arcane Power
Spell.Description: This arcane spell makes the casters spells more powerful for one hour.

Spell.Name: Wizard Shield
Spell.Description: This arcane spell blocks the next fifteen to twenty levels of spells targetting the caster for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Ironskin
Spell.Description: This arcane spell creates an inon skin around the caster giving protection from 150 points of damage for one hour.

Spell.Name: Time Stop
Spell.Description: This arcane spell allows the caster to operate by themselves for 10 seconds.

Spell.Name: Contingency
Spell.Description: This arcane spell allows the caster to be protected in case of death for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Festering Wounds
Spell.Description: This infernal cantrip causes a minor amount of non-elemental damage to a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Flame Dart
Spell.Description: This infernal cantrip hurls a small dart of fire at a single target.

Spell.Name: Acid Splash
Spell.Description: This infernal cantrip causes minor acid damage to a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Corrosive Grasp
Spell.Description: This infernal cantrip causes minor acid damage to a single target the caster can touch.

Spell.Name: Bestow Wound
Spell.Description: This infernal cantrip causes minor energy damage to a single target the caster can touch.

Spell.Name: Weaken
Spell.Description: This infernal cantrip gives the target a -1 penalty to hit in combat for one minute.

Spell.Name: Leaps and Bounds
Spell.Description: This infernal cantrip gives the caster a bonus to their dexterity and jumping skill for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Beguiler
Spell.Description: This infernal cantrip gives the caster a bonus to their charisma and diplomacy for one hour.

Spell.Name: Demonflesh
Spell.Description: This infernal cantrip gives the caster a +1 bonus to armor class for one hour.

Spell.Name: Devil Sight
Spell.Description: This infernal cantrip lets the caster see in the dark for one hour.

Spell.Name: Dark Bolt
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a black bolt to strike a single enemy causing minor amount of energy and cold damage.

Spell.Name: Doom Bolt
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a black bolt to strike a single humanoid enemy potentially killing them. If they survive they suffer a small amount of eldritch damage.

Spell.Name: Lesser Acid Orb
Spell.Description: This infernal spell hurls an orb of acid at a single enemy causing acid damage.

Spell.Name: Mega Volts
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a group of enemies to suffer minor electrical damage.

Spell.Name: Force Orbs
Spell.Description: This infernal spell hurls orbs of pure energy at a group of enemies causing blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Despair
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes the target to be afraid for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Pox
Spell.Description: This infernal spell lowers the armor class and saving throws of the target for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Subversion
Spell.Description: This infernal curse lowers the armor class as well as the willpower and fortitude saving throws of a group of targets for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Sap Strength
Spell.Description: This infernal curse lowers the strength of the target for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Resist Elements
Spell.Description: This infernal spell improves the casters resistence to fire, earth, ice and air damage for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Eldritch Wells
Spell.Description: This infernal spell improves the casters magic point regeneration bonus for one hour but causes a large penalty to their willpower.

Spell.Name: Entropic Warding
Spell.Description: This infernal spell creates one mirror image of the caster and improves their sneak skill for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Abyssal Might
Spell.Description: This infernal spell improves the casters strength and dexterity for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Eldritch Burst
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a non-elemental damage to a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Hellfire
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes moderate hellfire damage to a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Steal Life
Spell.Description: This infernal spell absorbs a small amount of health from a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Wrack
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes strength loss and a minor amount of piercing damage to a single enemy for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Curse
Spell.Description: This infernal spell gives the target a +1 bonus to hit in combat for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Cause Disease
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes the target to develop a debilitating disease for 24 hours.

Spell.Name: Summon Imp
Spell.Description: This infernal spell summons a fiendish imp to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Corroding Aura
Spell.Description: This infernal spell provides imbues a single ally so their physical attacks also cause acid damage for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Shadow Skin
Spell.Description: This infernal spell wraps the caster in shadows for ten minutes, increasing their armor and resistance to attack.

Spell.Name: Soul Shield
Spell.Description: This infernal spell uses a small portion of their soul to create a shield that blocks the next ten to twelve levels of spells targetting the caster for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Destroy Magic
Spell.Description: This infernal spell attempts to remove all magical effects from a single target.

Spell.Name: Walk Unseen
Spell.Description: This infernal spell shrouds the caster in darkness for five minutes, effectively rendering them invisible.

Spell.Name: Dark Blast
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a small amount of non-elemental damage to a all enemies.

Spell.Name: Arc Lightning
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a small group of enemies to sustain a moderate amount of electrical damage.

Spell.Name: Acid Ball
Spell.Description: This infernal spell hurls a ball of acid at a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Damning Darkness
Spell.Description: This infernal spell creates a magical cloud of darkness that blinds and damages enemies for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Choke
Spell.Description: This infernal spell crushes the throat of a humanoid for a short period, causing blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Doom
Spell.Description: This infernal spell gives the target signicant penalties to their saving throws, armor class and attack for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Call Chaos
Spell.Description: This infernal spell effects the selected enemies with a wide range of random debilitating effects.

Spell.Name: Astral Gate
Spell.Description: This infernal spell summons a random creature to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Stoneskin
Spell.Description: This infernal spell gives the caster 50 points of damage shielding for one hour.

Spell.Name: Lesser Globe of Invulverability
Spell.Description: This infernal spell makes the caster immune to spells of level 3 or lower for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Magic Missile Storm
Spell.Description: This infernal spell hurls a number of magical missiles at a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Hellfire Blast
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes moderate hellfire damage to a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Acid Orb
Spell.Description: This infernal spell hurls an orb of acid at a single enemy causing moderate damage.

Spell.Name: Disintigrate
Spell.Description: This spell hurls a black bolt of infernal energy at a single opponent which will either kill them outright or cause energy damage if they survive.

Spell.Name: Black Tentacles
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes oozing black tentacles from someones nightmare to rise up and constrict a small group of enemies, potentially stunning them and causing blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Torture
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes strength loss and a moderate amount of piercing damage to a single enemy for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Mass Curse
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a group of enemies to be cursed, lowering their stats for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Call Nightmare
Spell.Description: This infernal spell summons a fiendish nightmare to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Devil Speed
Spell.Description: This infernal spell increases the casters speed and armor bonus for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Hellfire Shield
Spell.Description: This infernal spell gives the caster a shield of hellfire, protecting them from fire and damaging enemies that strike them in hand to hand combat.

Spell.Name: Acidic Shield
Spell.Description: This infernal spell gives the caster a coating of acid, protecting them from acid and damaging enemies that strike them in hand to hand combat.

Spell.Name: Spell of Reflection
Spell.Description: This infernal spell protects the caster by reflecting the next nine levels of spells back at their casters for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Vitriolic Sphere
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a large sphere of acid to fall on a group of enemies, causing moderate damage.

Spell.Name: Soul Rend
Spell.Description: This infernal spell absorbs a small amount of health from a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Inferno
Spell.Description: This infernal spell creates a gout of fire that causes minor fire damage to a group of enemies for one minute.

Spell.Name: Call the Void
Spell.Description: This infernal spell has a chance to kill or otherwise seriously mess up a large group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Stop Heart
Spell.Description: This infernal spell attempts to stop the heart of a single humanoid enemy.

Spell.Name: Wither
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a large amount of piercing damage to a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Drain Power
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a fair amount of mp to be drained from a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Bestow Greater Curse
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a single enemy to suffer large penalties to attack and defence for one hour.

Spell.Name: Crushing Despair
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a group of enemies to suffer large penalties to their willpower as well as their initiative and armor class for twenty minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Demon
Spell.Description: This infernal spell summons a demon to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Globe of Invulnerability
Spell.Description: This infernal spell makes the caster immune to spells of level 5 or lower for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Shadow Flare
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a large amount of dark energy damage to all enemies.

Spell.Name: Hellfire Storm
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a large amount of hellfire damage to all enemies.

Spell.Name: Acid Storm
Spell.Description: This arcane causes acid to rain down on a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Aramgeddon
Spell.Description: This arcane causes massage damage to a large group of enemies while potentially causing the same damage to the party.

Spell.Name: Crushing Fist of Spite
Spell.Description: This infernal spell causes a fist of darkness to appear 30 feet above the group and begin smashing a group of enemies with incredible power for a large amount of blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Kill
Spell.Description: This infernal spell attempts to kill a single humanoid enemy.

Spell.Name: Hell Gate
Spell.Description: This infernal spell literally opens the gates of hell unleashing the ire of a greater demon upon the enemy.

Spell.Name: Infernal Power
Spell.Description: This infernal spell makes the casters spells more powerful for one hour.

Spell.Name: Dark Shield
Spell.Description: This infernal spell protects the caster by reflecting the next twenty levels of spells back at their casters for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Turn Undead
Spell.Description: This divine cantrip causes an undead creature to be afraid for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Benediction
Spell.Description: This divine cantrip gives the target a +1 bonus to hit in combat for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Resistance
Spell.Description: This holy cantrip improves the armor class and saving throws of the character for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Virtue
Spell.Description: This holy cantrip grants the caster a small increase to their HP and willpower saving throw for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Fear Ward
Spell.Description: This holy cantrip protect one ally against fear effects for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Awaken
Spell.Description: This holy cantrip wakes up one ally.

Spell.Name: Break Enchantment
Spell.Description: This holy cantrip removes one negative magical effect from the caster.

Spell.Name: Second Wind
Spell.Description: This holy cantrip increases the stamina regeneration rate of one ally for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Cure Minor Wounds
Spell.Description: This divine cantrip heals an ally of a small amount of hit points.

Spell.Name: Light
Spell.Description: This holy cantrip creates a small light centered on the caster that lasts for one hour.

Spell.Name: Disrupt Undead
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes a small amount of magical damage to a single undead enemy.

Spell.Name: Shrapnel
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes a small amount of slashing damage to a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Silence
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes the target to be silent for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Blessing
Spell.Description: This holy spell improves the attack bonus of nearby allies for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Shield of Faith
Spell.Description: This holy spell improves the armor class of the character for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Just Cause
Spell.Description: This holy spell improves the charisma, willpower and fortitude of the caster for one hour.

Spell.Name: Consecrate
Spell.Description: This holy spell improves the saving throws of the party for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Consecrate
Spell.Description: This holy spell improves the physical damage resistance of the party for twenty minutes.

Spell.Name: Divine Favour
Spell.Description: This holy spell improves the strength, vitality and dexterity of the caster for 24 hours.

Spell.Name: Resist Energy
Spell.Description: This arcane holy improves the casters resistence to fire, earth, ice and air damage for one hour.

Spell.Name: Cure Poison
Spell.Description: This divine spell stops poison in the target.

Spell.Name: Aid
Spell.Description: This divine spells heals an ally of a small amount of hit points and gives them a small amount of temporary hit points for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Cure Light Wounds
Spell.Description: This divine spell heals an ally of a small amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Daylight
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes minor holy and fire damage to all undead enemies for fifteen seconds.

Spell.Name: Repulse Undead
Spell.Description: This divine cantrip causes a small group of undead creatures to be afraid for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Weaken Undead
Spell.Description: This holy spell reduces a single undead creatures attack bonus for ten minutes in addition to causing minor holy damage.

Spell.Name: Prayer
Spell.Description: This holy spell improves the attack bonus of nearby allies for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Soul Forge
Spell.Description: This holy spell gives the caster wisdom and willpower bonuses so they can resist the forces of darkness.

Spell.Name: Lesser Mantle
Spell.Description: This holy spell blocks the next five to eight levels of spells against the caster.

Spell.Name: Dispel Magic
Spell.Description: This holy spell attempts to remove one magical effect from a single target.

Spell.Name: Cure Disease
Spell.Description: This holy spell removes any diseases on the selected target.

Spell.Name: Lesser Restoration
Spell.Description: This holy spell restores lost levels and attributes for a single ally.

Spell.Name: Charm of Life
Spell.Description: This holy spell gives the caster and their allies temporary hit points for forty minutes.

Spell.Name: Lionheart
Spell.Description: This holy spell gives the caster and their allies protection from fear effects for one hour.

Spell.Name: Cure Medium Wounds
Spell.Description: This divine spell heals an ally of a moderate amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Penance
Spell.Description: This holy spell stuns for two and half minutes and causes minor ongoing holy damage to one demon.

Spell.Name: Holy
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes holy damage to one enemy.

Spell.Name: Protection From Energy
Spell.Description: This holy spell improves the casters resistence to fire, earth, ice and air damage for twelve hours.

Spell.Name: Death Ward
Spell.Description: This holy spell protects the selected target from instant kill effects for one hour.

Spell.Name: Consecration
Spell.Description: This holy spell shields the caster from some slashing damage for one hour as well as grants the party a bonus to willpower for twenty minutes.

Spell.Name: Mantle
Spell.Description: This holy spell blocks the next ten to twelve levels of spells targetting the caster for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Remove Curse
Spell.Description: This holy spell removes any curses on the selected target.

Spell.Name: Remove Paralysis
Spell.Description: This holy spell removes any stunning effects on the selected target.

Spell.Name: Cure Serious Wounds
Spell.Description: This divine spell heals an ally of a medium amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Regeneration
Spell.Description: This divine spell incrases an allies health point regeneration rate for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Rest
Spell.Description: This divine spell heals an ally of a medium amount of stamina points.

Spell.Name: Divine Intervention
Spell.Description: This divine spell teleports the party to the nearest church or cathedral.

Spell.Name: Weaken Devils
Spell.Description: This holy spell reduces a group of demons attack and defence for a period of ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Flame Strike
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes flames to come down from the heavens striking a single target for moderate fire and magical damage.

Spell.Name: Blades
Spell.Description: This holy spell creates whirling blades which strike a group of enemies for moderate slashing damage.

Spell.Name: Hly Smite
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes a single target to suffer a strength penalty for ten minutes as well as take a moderate amount of holy damage.

Spell.Name: Atonement
Spell.Description: This holy spell removes all curses from the party.

Spell.Name: Mental Shield
Spell.Description: This holy spell protects the party against fear, sleep and silence for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Greater Break Enchantment
Spell.Description: This holy spell attempts to remove all magical effects from the casters allies.

Spell.Name: True Light
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes undead and demons to face penalties while the party gets bonuses for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: High Prayer
Spell.Description: This holy spell improves the attack bonus of nearby allies for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Raise Dead
Spell.Description: This holy spell protects the selected target from instant kill effects.

Spell.Name: Power Cure
Spell.Description: This divine spell heals an ally of a large amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Mass Cure Light Wounds
Spell.Description: This divine spell heals an ally of a small amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Walk on Water and Air
Spell.Description: This divine spell lets the party walk on either water or air.

Spell.Name: Sunbeam
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes a moderate amount of fire damage and potentially blinds a group of undead enemies.

Spell.Name: Destroy Undead
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes a large amount of holy damage to a group of undead enemies.

Spell.Name: Dismissal
Spell.Description: This holy spell attempts to destroy one demon.

Spell.Name: Harm
Spell.Description: This divine spell causes a large amount of health point damage to a single touched target.

Spell.Name: Summon Angel
Spell.Description: This holy spell summons an angel to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Elemental Resistance: Fire
Spell.Description: This holy spell protects a single party member from fire for one hour.

Spell.Name: Elemental Resistance: Ice
Spell.Description: This holy spell protects a single party member from ice for one hour.

Spell.Name: Elemental Resistance: Lightning
Spell.Description: This holy spell protects a single party member from lightning for one hour.

Spell.Name: Elemental Resistance: Acid
Spell.Description: This holy spell protects a single party member from acid for one hour.

Spell.Name: Stream of Life
Spell.Description: This holy spell grants the party extra health points and an improved regeneration rate for one hour.

Spell.Name: Greater Mantle
Spell.Description: This holy spell blocks the next fifteen to twenty levels of spells targetting the caster for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Holy Armor
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes the priest to be greatly protected by their faith for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Heal
Spell.Description: This divine spell heals an ally of a large amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Holy Word
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes holy damage to a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Banishment
Spell.Description: This holy spell attempts to destroy a small group of demons.

Spell.Name: Summon Archangel
Spell.Description: This holy spell summons an archangel to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Providence
Spell.Description: This holy spell provides a large amount of protection to the entire party for one hour.

Spell.Name: Energy Resistance: Holy
Spell.Description: This holy spell protects a single party member from holy damage for one hour.

Spell.Name: Energy Resistance: Unholy
Spell.Description: This holy spell protects a single party member from unholy damage for one hour.

Spell.Name: Heavenly Light
Spell.Description: This holy spell causes undead and demons to face penalties while the party gets bonuses for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Miracle
Spell.Description: This holy spell removes all harmful status effects from the party members and then heals them a small amount of health and stamina points.

Spell.Name: Ressurection
Spell.Description: This holy spell raises the target from the dead and then heals them.

Spell.Name: Righteousness
Spell.Description: This holy spell grants the caster bonuses from their faith.

Spell.Name: Crusade
Spell.Description: This mighty holy spell grants the party large bonuses to attack and damage for eight hours.

Spell.Name: Mass Cure Serious Wounds
Spell.Description: This divine spell heals the party of a small amount of hit points.

Spell.Name: Restfull
Spell.Description: This divine spell heals a large amount of stamina points for the entire party.

Spell.Name: Snowball
Spell.Description: This necromantic cantrip hurls a small snowball at a single enemy for minor ice and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Draining Grasp
Spell.Description: This necromantic cantrip drains a small amount of HP from the target humanoid the caster touches.

Spell.Name: Fatigue
Spell.Description: This necromantic cantrip drains a small amount of SP from the target.

Spell.Name: Bone Blast
Spell.Description: This necromantic cantrip damages a single targets vitality for one hour.

Spell.Name: Scare
Spell.Description: This necromantic cantrip causes the target to be afraid for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Doom
Spell.Description: This necromantic cantrip gives a penalty to the saving throws and attack bonus of the target for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Bane
Spell.Description: This necromantic cantrip reduces a group of enemies attack bonus and willpower for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Power of the Grave
Spell.Description: This necromantic cantrip gives the caster a +2 bonus to their strength and attack bonus for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Flesh Armor
Spell.Description: This necromantic cantrip toughens the casters flesh giving them a +1 bonus to armor class for one hour.

Spell.Name: False Life
Spell.Description: This necromantic cantrip gives the caster 10 temporary health points for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Negative Energy Ray
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell creates a number of small energy spheres that strike a single target.

Spell.Name: Ray of Frost
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell strikes a single enemy target with a ray of frost, causing minor ice damage.

Spell.Name: Indigestion
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes a target to suffer minor slashing damage and become nauseous.

Spell.Name: Wretching and Kvetching
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell creates a cloud of gas that causes a group of humanoid creates to save or be nauseaous for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Calm Undead
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes an undead creature to stop attacking for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Ghoul Touch
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes disease in the target the caster touches.

Spell.Name: Grave Doom
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell a single target to suffer attack and armor penalties for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Skeleton
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell summons a skeleton to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Resist Energy
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell improves the casters resistence to fire, earth, ice and air damage for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Blood Frenzy
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell gives the target an extra attack and strength for ten minutes at a penalty to their armor class. It also causes a small amount of damage over 15 seconds.

Spell.Name: Stone Bones
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell gives the caster a +2 bonus to armor class and vitality for one hour.

Spell.Name: Drain Life
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell drains a small amount of HP from the target.

Spell.Name: Poison Gas
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes poison damage for thirty seconds.

Spell.Name: Iceball
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell hurls a ball of ice at a small group of enemies for ice and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Evil Eye
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes the target humanoid to be cursed for four hours and suffer mild damage to their hearts for one minute.

Spell.Name: Power Leech
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes the target group to be drained of stamina.

Spell.Name: Hold Undead
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes the target to be held for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Putrid Husk
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes ability score loss for ten minutes to the target the caster touches.

Spell.Name: Cause Disease
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes disease to a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Weakness
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes the target to suffer damage and attack penalties for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Zombie
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell summons a zombie to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Nausea Aura
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell imbues a single ally so their physical attacks also cause nausea for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Bone Armor
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell gives the caster a bonus to their armor class and physical resistance for one hour.

Spell.Name: Negative Energy Blast
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell creates a blast of unholy energy that strike a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Distortion
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes a single target to suffer minor physical damage.

Spell.Name: Icelance
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell hurls a lance made of pure ice at a single target causing ice and piercing damage.

Spell.Name: Castigate
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell attempts to kill a single humanoid enemy. If it fails the enemy still suffers a small amount of energy damage

Spell.Name: Pain
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes a single humanoid enemy to double over in pain, suffering slashing damage and temporary losing vitality.

Spell.Name: Absorb Strength
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell drains strength from the target for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Famine
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell gives a vitality penalty to a small group of enemies for one hour.

Spell.Name: Desecrate
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes an area to be unhallowed for one hour, giving undead there multiple bonuses.

Spell.Name: Greater Calm Undead
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes a group of undead creatures to stop attacking for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Ghoul
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell summons a ghoul to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Vampiric Aura
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell imbues a single ally so their physical attacks also drain health points for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Ghost Armor
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell gives the caster a +4 bonus to armor class and a +2 bonus to dexterity for one hour.

Spell.Name: Deep Freeze
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes a large amount of ice damage to a single target with a small chance of paralyzation.

Spell.Name: Toxic Vapors
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes poison damage for one minute.

Spell.Name: Soul Trap
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes the target humanoid to make a willpower save or have their soul ripped out of their body, killing them.

Spell.Name: Dominate Undead
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes the target undead to be controlled for 10 minutes.

Spell.Name: Paralyze
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes the target to be held for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Energy Drain
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes the target to lose four levels for one hour.

Spell.Name: Terrify
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes the targets to be afraid for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Blasphemy
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes the targets to be suffer multiple penalties for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: Evil Omens
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes all enemies to suffer penalties for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Ghost
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell summons a ghost to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Level Drain Aura
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell imbues a single ally so their physical attacks also level drain for thirty minutes.

Spell.Name: ironbones
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell gives the caster a +4 bonus to armor class and prevents 50 points of damage for one hour.

Spell.Name: Cone of Cold
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell conjure a cone of intense cold and ice at a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Drain Life Blast
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell drains a small amount of HP from a group of targets.

Spell.Name: Implosion
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes a single enemy to suffer a large amount of physical damage.

Spell.Name: Deadly Poison
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell attempts to kill a single creature if it is a humanoid. Regardless a moderate to large amount of poison damage is sustained.

Spell.Name: Death Cloud
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes poison damage for one minute. Humanoid creatures also have a chance of being killed outright.

Spell.Name: Heart Clutch
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell attempts to stop the heart of a single humanoid enemy.

Spell.Name: Cruel Unbinding
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell attempts to remove all magical effects on a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Destroy Undead
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell attempts to destroy a single undead enemy.

Spell.Name: Evil Presence
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell baths an area in negative energy for thirty minutes, providing problems for mortals while strengthening undead.

Spell.Name: Pestilence
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell is a more powerful version of the famine spell, it also weakens enemies and has a chance of causing disease.

Spell.Name: Gibbering Terrors
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell shows horrible cosmic visions that cause a chance of terror and insanity to a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Summon Wraith
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell summons a wraith to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Armageddon
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes a fair amount of fire and blunt damage to all enemies.

Spell.Name: Horrid Wilting
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell damages a group of targets with unholy damage.

Spell.Name: Freezing Sphere
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell damages a group of targets with ice damage and potentially stuns them for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Mass Distortion
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes a group of enemies to suffer moderate physical damage.

Spell.Name: Circle of Death
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell attempts to kill a group of humanoid enemies.

Spell.Name: Death Blossom
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes a single enemy to make willpower and fortitude saves or die.

Spell.Name: Pestilence
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell causes disease to all enemies.

Spell.Name: Summon Lich
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell summons a lich to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Spellshield
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell blocks the next twelve to fifteen levels of spells targetting the caster for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Unrighteous Indignation
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell raises the casters willpower and mental faculties for one hour.

Spell.Name: Wraithform
Spell.Description: This necromantic spell blocks most physical damage for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Snowball
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip hurls a small snowball at a single enemy for minor ice and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Frostbite
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip causes a touched enemy to suffer ice damage.

Spell.Name: Quills
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip hurls two small quils at a single enemy causing piercing damage.

Spell.Name: Poison Spray
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip sprays toxic poison at a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Stink Bomb
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip makes the air around some enemies stinkier, potentially causing them to become nauseaous for one minute.

Spell.Name: Animal Dozer
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip causes the target animal to fall asleep for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Calm Animal
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip causes the target animal to be calmed for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Ferret
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip summons a ferret to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Camoflauge
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip helps an ally blend into their surroundings for one hour.

Spell.Name: Spiderskin
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip transforms the casters skin to the hairy, leathery skin of a spider for one hour.

Spell.Name: Balm
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip heals an ally of a small amount of hit points.

Spell.Name: Glowing Light
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip creates a small, softly glowing light that circles the caster for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Icicle
Spell.Description: This nature spell hurls a spiked shard of ice at a single enemy for ice and piercing damage.

Spell.Name: Lava Splash
Spell.Description: This nature spell hurls molten lava at a single enemy for fire and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Whipping Rocks
Spell.Description: This nature spell hurls a number of rocks at a group of enemies causing blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Shrill Sound
Spell.Description: This nature spell emits a high pitch sound causing minor blunt and piercing damage to a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Entangle
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes vines to sprout up under a group of enemies, attempting to entrap and incapacitate them for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Faerie Fire
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes a group of enemies to be surrounded by harmless red fire for five minutes, partially negating the advantages of invisibility and making the enemies easier to strike in combat.

Spell.Name: Daze Animal
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes the target animal to be stunned for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Badger
Spell.Description: This nature spell summons a badger to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Resist Energy
Spell.Description: This nature spell improves the casters resistence to fire, earth, ice and air damage for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Polar Bear Strength
Spell.Description: This nature spell improves the strength of the caster for 24 hours.

Spell.Name: Elephant Toughness
Spell.Description: This nature spell improves the vitality of the caster for 24 hours.

Spell.Name: Eagles Grace
Spell.Description: This nature spell improves the dexterity of the caster for 24 hours.

Spell.Name: Cheetahs Speed
Spell.Description: This nature spell improves the speed of the caster for 24 hours.

Spell.Name: Barkskin
Spell.Description: This nature cantrip gives the touched target a +3 bonus to armor class for one hour.

Spell.Name: Natures Cure
Spell.Description: This nature spell heals an ally of a moderate amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Spike Growth
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes a sharp vines to spring up around a group of enemies inflicting slashing and piercing damage.

Spell.Name: Call Lightning
Spell.Description: This nature spell conjures lightning that comes down and strikes a small group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Snowball Storm
Spell.Description: This nature spell hurls a small snowball at a small group of enemies for minor ice and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Greenfire
Spell.Description: This nature spell creates virulent green acidic energy which does minor acid damage.

Spell.Name: Viscid Glob
Spell.Description: This nature spell hurls a small glob at a single enemy slowing them for two minutes, causing a minor amount of acid damage and potentially stunning them for a short period of time.

Spell.Name: Snowball Storm
Spell.Description: This nature spell potentially causes a group of humanoids to fall asleep for thirty seconds.

Spell.Name: Dominate Animal
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes the target animal to be controlled for 10 minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Wolf
Spell.Description: This nature spell summons a wolf to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Natures Power
Spell.Description: This nature spell improves the strength and dexterity of the caster for 24 hours.

Spell.Name: Dispel Magic
Spell.Description: This nature spell attempts to remove one magical effect from the target.

Spell.Name: Gaias Bounty
Spell.Description: This nature spell heals all allies a moderate amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Trolls Blood
Spell.Description: This nature spell heals the caster, increases their vitality and raises their health regeneration rate for one hour.

Spell.Name: Wildfire
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes fire to burn uncontrollably around a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Sleet Storm
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes a heavy sleet storm over a group of enemies inflicting ice and piercing damage.

Spell.Name: Acid Burst
Spell.Description: This nature spell creates a burst of acid which covers a small group of enemies for moderate damage.

Spell.Name: Rock Blast
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes the rocks beneath the enemies feet to explode for moderate blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Quill Burst
Spell.Description: This nature spell hurls a number of quills at a group of enemies causing piercing and poison damage.

Spell.Name: Web
Spell.Description: This nature spell conjures a magical web that holds a small group of enemies to be held for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Noxious Fumes
Spell.Description: This nature spell creates a gas that potentially causes all enemies to become nasseous for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Mass Animal Dozer
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes the target group of animals to fall asleep for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Swarm
Spell.Description: This nature spell summons a swarm of insects to attack all enemies.

Spell.Name: Stoneskin
Spell.Description: This nature spell gives the caster 50 points of damage shielding for one hour.

Spell.Name: Gaias Blessing
Spell.Description: This nature spell gives the party health and vitality bonuses for twenty minutes.

Spell.Name: Air Pocket
Spell.Description: This nature spell removes the effects of nausea and poison gas and protects against them for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Cure Medium Wounds
Spell.Description: This nature spell heals an ally of a moderate amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Thunder Storm
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes lightning to shoot from enemy to enemy.

Spell.Name: Ice Storm
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes a storm over a group of enemies inflicting ice and piercing damage.

Spell.Name: Lava Blast
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes a small group of enemies to have explosive lava blast them.

Spell.Name: Spike Stones
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes stones to be flung at a group of enemies causing piercing and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Natures Fury
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes a storm of wind and rain potentially blinding all enemies for ten minutes.

Spell.Description: This nature spell creates a cloud of poisonous gas that affects a group of enemies for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Mass Daze Animal
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes the target group of animals to be stunned for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Bear
Spell.Description: This nature spell summons a bear to attack enemies.

Spell.Description: This nature spell removes any diseases on the selected target.

Spell.Description: This nature spell improves the strength of the party for 24 hours.

Spell.Name: Mass Elephant Toughness

Spell.Name: Circle of Healing
Spell.Description: This nature spell heals the party a moderate amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Call Lightning Storm
Spell.Description: This nature spell conjures lightning that comes down and strikes all of enemies.

Spell.Name: Tsnunami
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes heavy winds and water to strike all opponents.

Spell.Name: Deadly Swarm
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes insects to swarm all enemies causing piercing damage.

Spell.Name: Acid Fog
Spell.Description: This nature spell creates a corrosive fog that burns enemies for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Deadly Air
Spell.Description: This nature spell creates a poisonous cloud that kills weaker enemies and poisons those who survive.

Spell.Name: whirlwind
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes a whirlwind to stir up debris harming a group of enemies with slashing, piercing and blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Moonray
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes holy damage to all outsider enemies while healing all allies.

Spell.Name: Sunbeam
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes blinding fiery light that damages undead with burning flames.

Spell.Name: Harm
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes a large amount of health point damage to a single touched target.

Spell.Name: Solar Flare
Spell.Description: This nature spell potentially blinds all enemies for one hour.

Spell.Name: Mass Dominate Animal
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes the target group of animals to be controlled for 10 minutes.

Spell.Name: Summon Dryad
Spell.Description: This nature spell summons a dryad to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Iron Wood
Spell.Description: This nature spell gives the caster a +6 bonus to armor class for two hours.

Spell.Name: Fate
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes many random bonuses to happen to the party. Who knows what will happen when unpredictable nature is released?

Spell.Name: Heal
Spell.Description: This nature spell heals an ally of a large amount of health points.

Spell.Name: Earthquake
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes the very earth to shake, causing blunt damage to all enemies with a slight chance to kill some.

Spell.Name: Storm of Vengeance
Spell.Description: This nature spell creates a storm of lightning, acid and hail to pound all enemies for up to thirty seconds.

Spell.Name: Chain Lightning
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes lightning to shoot from enemy to enemy.

Spell.Name: Star Burst
Spell.Description: This nature spell castable at night causes energy and blunt damage to all enemies.

Spell.Name: Destroy Undead
Spell.Description: This nature spell causes a large amount of magical damage to a group of undead enemies.

Spell.Name: Asphyxiation
Spell.Description: This nature spell attempts to kill all enemy humanoids.

Spell.Description: This nature spell summons a fire elemental to attack enemies.

Spell.Description: This nature spell summons a water elemental to attack enemies.

Spell.Description: This nature spell summons an air elemental to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Summon Earth Elemental
Spell.Description: This nature spell summons an earth elemental to attack enemies.

Spell.Name: Ironskin
Spell.Description: This nature spell creates an inon skin around the caster giving protection from 150 points of damage for two hours.

Spell.Name: Raise Dead
Spell.Description: This nature spell protects the selected target from instant kill effects.

Spell.Name: Renewal
Spell.Description: This nature spell heals nearby allies and helps improve their regeneration of health points.

Spell.Name: Headache
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip causes a minor amount of damage to a single humanoid enemy.

Spell.Name: Spirit Lash
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip causes a minor amount of mental damage to a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Hail of Stone
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip telekinetically hurls a few small stones at a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Ghost Sound
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip causes a target to hear a screaming ghost that puts them to sleep for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Fear
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip causes the target humanoid to be afraid for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Distract
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip causes the target to be confused for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Daze Person
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip causes the target humanoid to be stunned for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Calm Humanoid
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip causes the target humanoid to be calmed for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Blindness
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip causes the target to be blinded for two minutes.

Spell.Name: Awaken
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip wakes up one ally.

Spell.Name: Mental Boost
Spell.Description: This psionic spell gives the caster a +5 bonus to willpower for twenty four hours.

Spell.Name: Appraisal
Spell.Description: This psionic spell gives the caster a +10 bonus to their artifacts skill for one hour.

Spell.Name: Mental Attack
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes a small amount of damage and a chance of fear to a single humanoid enemy.

Spell.Name: Combust
Spell.Description: This psionic pyrokinetic spell causes a small amount of fire damage a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Psychic Shock
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes a small amount of mental and lightning damage a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Psychic Grig
Spell.Description: This psionic telekinetic spell causes a small amount of blunt damage to a single enemy over a period of time.

Spell.Name: Sharp Metal
Spell.Description: This psionic cantrip telekinetically hurls a few pieces of jagged metal at a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Confusion
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target to be confused for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Spell Blast
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target to lose one of their spell effects.

Spell.Name: Color Spray

Spell.Name: Read Mind
Spell.Description: This psionic spell attempts to read the targets mind.

Spell.Name: Psychic Shield
Spell.Description: This psionic spell gives the caster a +2 bonus to armor class and increases their willpower saving throw for twenty four hours.

Spell.Name: Blur
Spell.Description: This psionic illusion spell creates two mirrored images of the caster for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Blinding Beauty
Spell.Description: This psionic spell improves the casters charisma for twenty four hours.

Spell.Name: Featherfall
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the party to take less damage from falling.

Spell.Name: Detect Secrets
Spell.Description: This psionic spell improves a single ally's scouting ability for one hour.

Spell.Name: Divine Trap
Spell.Description: This psionic spell improves a single ally's disable trap ability for one hour.

Spell.Name: Illusary Wounds
Spell.Description: This psionic illusion spell causes a small amount piercing and slashing damage to a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Pyrotechnics
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes a small amount of fire damage and a minor amount of magical damage to a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Telekinesis
Spell.Description: This psionic telekinetic spell causes a small amount piercing and crushing damage to a group of enemies.

Spell.Name: Insanity
Spell.Description: This psionic spell makes a group of humanoid enemies go insane for one hour.

Spell.Name: Daze Monster
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target to be stunned for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Stasis
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target to be put in stasis for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Banish
Spell.Description: This psionic spell attempts to unsummon or remove a weaker outsider from the prime material plane.

Spell.Name: Shimmering Shield
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target to become hazy and blurred for ten minutes, making it harder to hit them in combat.

Spell.Name: Cure Madness
Spell.Description: This psionic spell removes insanity on the selected target.

Spell.Name: Heroism
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target to resist fear effects for one hour.

Spell.Name: Clairvoyance
Spell.Description: This psionic spell lets the caster see the area they are in.

Spell.Name: Psionic Blast
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes mental damage and a chance of fear or confusion to a group of humanoid enemies.

Spell.Name: Nightmare
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes mental damage and a chance of terror and sleep to a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Steeldance
Spell.Description: This psionic telekinetic spell causes daggers to fly at a group of enemies for a small amount slashing damage.

Spell.Name: Dominate Person
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target humanoid to be controlled for 10 minutes.

Spell.Name: Disenchant True
Spell.Description: This psionic spell attempts to remove all spell effects from a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Glitterdust
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target enemies to be blinded for five minutes as well as removing invisibility from them.

Spell.Name: Invisbility
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target to become invisible for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Haste
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes allies to be hasted for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Slow
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes enemies to be slowed for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Legend Lore
Spell.Description: This psionic spell gives the caster a large bonus to their artifacts skill for eight hours.

Spell.Name: Transmute
Spell.Description: This psionic spell attempts to turn a lead ingot into a gold one. The chance of success is unknown.

Spell.Name: Levitate
Spell.Description: This psionic spell allows the party to levitate up or down.

Spell.Name: Mind Blast
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes mental damage to a group of humanoid enemies.

Spell.Name: Psionic Fires
Spell.Description: This psionic spell engulfs a small group of enemies in rolling flames.

Spell.Name: Scintillating Sphere
Spell.Description: This psionic spell creates a sparkling sphere of energy that slams into a small group of enemies causing a small amount of fire, ice and lightning damage.

Spell.Name: Forcewave
Spell.Description: This psionic telekinetic spell slams a small group of enemies with a face of telekinetic force, causing a small amount of blunt damage and stunning them for thirty seconds.

Spell.Name: Mass Hold Person
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target enemies to be stunned for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Calm Monster
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target enemy to be calmed for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Terrify
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes a group of humanoid enemies to be afraid for twenty minutes.

Spell.Name: Mindfog
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes a group of humanoid enemies to be become slower and less coordinated for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Feeblemind
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes an enemy to lose intelligence and wisdom for twenty minutes.

Spell.Name: Mirror Image
Spell.Description: This psionic spell creates three to six illusionary duplicates of the caster for twenty minutes.

Spell.Name: Aura of Majesty
Spell.Description: This psionic spell improves the casters charisma, speaking skill and wisdom for eight hours.

Spell.Name: Shalidors Mirror
Spell.Description: This psionic spell reflects four to six spells back at their caster.

Spell.Name: Word of recallstart
Spell.Description: This psionic spell teleports the party to the adventures starting location.

Spell.Name: Telepathy
Spell.Description: This psionic spell attempts to read the targets mind.

Spell.Name: Comet
Spell.Description: This psionic spell telekinetically draws a number of small comets that strike all enemies for blunt and fire damage.

Spell.Name: Telekinetic Burst
Spell.Description: This psionic telekinetic spell causes nearby objects to fly at a group of enemies for a moderate amount of blunt damage.

Spell.Name: Phantasmal Killer
Spell.Description: This psionic spell attempts to cause a single humanoid enemy to believe they have died.

Spell.Name: Mirage
Spell.Description: This psionic illusion spell causes a group of enemies to become confused or stunned for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Dominate Monster
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target to be controlled for 10 minutes.

Spell.Name: Suppress Magic
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target enemies to be silenced and dumbstruck for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Mass Invisbility
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target party members to become invisible for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Greater Heroism
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target to be immune to fear for one hour.

Spell.Name: Ethereal
Spell.Description: This psionic spell makes the caster immune to physical damage for five minutes.

Spell.Name: Magic Immunity
Spell.Description: This psionic spell makes the caster immune to pure magical damage and greatly improves their saving throws for one hour.

Spell.Name: Fly
Spell.Description: This psionic spell allows the party to fly for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Mind Flay
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes a large amount mental damage and a chance of fear, insanity or sleep to a group of humanoid enemies.

Spell.Name: Prismatic Spray
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes a small amount fire, ice and lightning damage and a chance of confusion and stunning to a group of humanoid enemies.

Spell.Name: Kill
Spell.Description: This psionic spell attempts to kill a single humanoid enemy.

Spell.Name: Mass Hold Monster
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target enemies to be stunned for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Mass Haste
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes allies to be hasted for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Mass Slow
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target enemies to be slowed for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Disjunction True
Spell.Description: This psionic spell attempts to remove all spell effects from all enemies.

Spell.Name: Geas
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the target humanoid enemies to be controlled for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Mind Blank
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the caster to be immune to many mental effects for one hour.

Spell.Name: Spell Absorption
Spell.Description: This psionic spell causes the caster to be absorb spell effects for one hour.

Spell.Name: Shalidars Reversal
Spell.Description: This psionic spell protects the caster by reflecting the next twelve to fifteen levels of spells back at their casters for ten minutes.

Spell.Name: Thought Thief
Spell.Description: This psionic spell attempts to read the targets mind.
